newsitem.title: CANADA: Agrium Texas nitrogen plant restart delayed.
newsitem.headline: Agrium Texas nitrogen plant restart delayed.

text.p: Canadian fertilizer producer Agrium Inc said startup of its Borger, Texas nitrogen facility would be delayed 10 days following an air line rupture at the plant on Saturday.
Agrium said Monday the rupture occured between the plant's air compressor and secondary reformer unit, forcing a shutdown to complete repairs.
The plant was undergoing startup procedures after a turnaround at the time of the rupture, it said.
There were no injuries or releases of hazardous materials, it said. -- Reuters Calgary Bureau 403 531-1624
